mapper.update:
update lesson
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

`type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},

comment_medium_num = #{commentMediumNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_apply_num = #{totalApplyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recent_apply_num = #{recentApplyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
